title: Divine Lakshmi Kasula Haaram with Emerald Pendant & Matching Jhumkas
materials: Ruby. Hyderabadi Polish finish ensures lasting brilliance.
features: Intricately crafted Lakshmi Kasula Haaram featuring rows of CZ studded gold coins. The grand pendant boasts a vibrant Emerald center, surrounded by a halo of CZs and delicately dangling pearls. The matching Jhumkas showcase a miniature version of the pendant's floral design with a ruby accent.
colors: Predominantly gold with sparkling white CZ diamonds
occasions: and other auspicious occasions like Diwali or Ugadi. Also suitable for grand receptions and formal gatherings.
description: This exquisite set embodies traditional South Indian artistry with a touch of modern elegance. The Lakshmi Kasula Haaram is considered highly auspicious, symbolizing prosperity and good fortune. The meticulous craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure both beauty and longevity. The combination of gold, CZ diamonds, pearls, emerald, and ruby creates a captivating and luxurious look.
